original: @112a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @112a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: aa pra sa ha pra ka sa n'a ma /
analyzed: aa pra sa ha pra ka sa n'a ma /
translated: Aprasah캐prak캐san캐ma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rab tu mi gnas pa gsal bar ston pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: rab tu mi gnas pa gsal bar ston pa zhes bya ba /
translated: Clarifying Thorough Nonabiding

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to youthful Ma침ju콑r캶.

original: shes pa rab tu mi gnas pa //
analyzed: shes pa rab tu mi gnas pa //
translated: Consciousness does not abide

original: @112b sangs rgyas pha nor thams cad 'dod //游댷'on kyang 'bad med sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: @112b sangs rgyas pha nor thams cad 'dod // 'on kyang 'bad med sbyor ba yis //
translated: In the wealth of all buddhas.游댷However, when it acts for the welfare of sentient beings

original: gang tshe sems can don byed na'o //
analyzed: gang tshe sems can don byed na'o //
translated: Without effort,

original: gang phyir gzhan sel sgrub las skyes //
analyzed: gang phyir gzhan sel sgrub las skyes //
translated: Since it arises from the affirmation of other-exclusion,

original: de ni rtag dang chad la gnas //
analyzed: de ni rtag dang chad la gnas //
translated: It abides in permanence and annihilation.

original: rtag tu ma skyes mi 'gag nyid //
analyzed: rtag tu ma skyes mi 'gag nyid //
translated: Always unborn and unceasing,游댷Birth and cessation are the words of animals.

original: skye dang 'gag pa byol song tshig / gal te rang rig tshad ma ni //
analyzed: skye dang 'gag pa byol song tshig / gal te rang rig tshad ma ni //
translated: If reflexive awareness is valid cognition,

original: rig de sems can 'dod ma yin //
analyzed: rig de sems can 'dod ma yin //
translated: That awareness is not asserted to be sentient beings.

original: snang ba thams cad spang ba'i phyir //
analyzed: snang ba thams cad spang ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to abandon all appearances,

original: sems can bden pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sems can bden pa ma yin no //
translated: Sentient beings are not true.

original: rjes la sems can 'dod ce na //
analyzed: rjes la sems can 'dod ce na //
translated: If it is asserted that sentient beings exist later,

original: de tshe sems can rdzas yod min //
analyzed: de tshe sems can rdzas yod min //
translated: Then sentient beings do not substantially exist.

original: dam bcas gcod pa gnod pa'i don //
analyzed: dam bcas gcod pa gnod pa'i don //
translated: The statement that refutes the thesis is the meaning of the objection.

original: rjes su rtag pa zhes brjod do //
analyzed: rjes su rtag pa zhes brjod do //
translated: It is called the subsequent permanence.

original: dngos gzhi la yang rig pa yod //
analyzed: dngos gzhi la yang rig pa yod //
translated: The main part also has awareness.

original: rjes la de ltar snang ba'i phyir //
analyzed: rjes la de ltar snang ba'i phyir //
translated: Because it appears like that in the conclusion.

original: dang po mi rtog par 'gyur gyis //
analyzed: dang po mi rtog par 'gyur gyis //
translated: First, it becomes non-conceptual.

original: de las 'dzin pa'i shes pa'o //
analyzed: de las 'dzin pa'i shes pa'o //
translated: From that, there is the consciousness of grasping.

original: 'das dang ma 'ongs la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'das dang ma 'ongs la sogs pa'o //
translated: The past, future, and so on.

original: sems ni gnas pa yod ma yin //
analyzed: sems ni gnas pa yod ma yin //
translated: The mind does not exist as a location.

original: des na de dag med par ni //
analyzed: des na de dag med par ni //
translated: Therefore, without them,

original: 'gro la 'gro ba'i mgon pos bstan ;
analyzed: 'gro la 'gro ba'i mgon pos bstan ;
translated: The protector of beings has taught.

original: / chos rnams kyi ni skye ba nyid //
analyzed: / chos rnams kyi ni skye ba nyid //
translated: The arising of phenomena themselves

original: rang nyid gnyug ma bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: rang nyid gnyug ma bsam mi khyab //
translated: Is inconceivable in its natural state.

original: de nyid stong pa nyid ces brjod //
analyzed: de nyid stong pa nyid ces brjod //
translated: That itself is called emptiness.

original: chad pa'i rjes 'gro ma yin no //
analyzed: chad pa'i rjes 'gro ma yin no //
translated: It does not follow that it is nihilism.

original: rab tu mi gnas sa bon las //
analyzed: rab tu mi gnas sa bon las //
translated: From the seed that does not completely abide,

original: 'bras bu rab tu mi gnas 'byung //
analyzed: 'bras bu rab tu mi gnas 'byung //
translated: The fruit that does not completely abide arises.

original: skyob pa de nyid dam pa ste //
analyzed: skyob pa de nyid dam pa ste //
translated: That protector is the true state itself,

original: bcos ma'i bcos ma de bzhin no //
analyzed: bcos ma'i bcos ma de bzhin no //
translated: And likewise, the fabricated is fabricated.

original: de bzhin bsam gtan yod med ces //
analyzed: de bzhin bsam gtan yod med ces //
translated: Likewise, meditation is said to be existent and nonexistent,

original: chags med spyod la brjod du med //
analyzed: chags med spyod la brjod du med //
translated: But it is inexpressible for one who practices without attachment.

original: gang phyir rten nas 'byung ba rnams //
analyzed: gang phyir rten nas 'byung ba rnams //
translated: Because all dependently arisen things

original: nyams myong ji bzhin rtag tu skye //
analyzed: nyams myong ji bzhin rtag tu skye //
translated: Always arise just as they are experienced.

original: rten nas 'byung ba gang dang gang //
analyzed: rten nas 'byung ba gang dang gang //
translated: Whatever is dependently arisen

original: de de gnyis med sna tshogs sems //
analyzed: de de gnyis med sna tshogs sems //
translated: That is the mind of diversity, free from those two.

original: stong dang sna tshogs sems dbye bas //
analyzed: stong dang sna tshogs sems dbye bas //
translated: The mind of diversity and emptiness are distinguished.

original: chos dang longs spyod sprul pa nyid //
analyzed: chos dang longs spyod sprul pa nyid //
translated: The dharmak캐ya, sambhogak캐ya, and nirm캐攷ㅡk캐ya

original: bdag gis mi gnas brjod pa las //
analyzed: bdag gis mi gnas brjod pa las //
translated: are taught by me to be nonabiding.

original: bde ba bsgags pa gang yod des //
analyzed: bde ba bsgags pa gang yod des //
translated: Whatever obstructions to bliss there are游댷and all enjoyments

original: nye bar spyod pa thams cad dang // 'gro rnams mi gnas thob par shog / rab tu mi gnas pa gsal bar bstan pa /
analyzed: nye bar spyod pa thams cad dang // 'gro rnams mi gnas thob par shog / rab tu mi gnas pa gsal bar bstan pa /
translated: may all beings attain nonabiding.游댷The Elucidation of Nonabiding

original: slob dpon gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob dpon gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: is completed.

original: // / badzra p'a ni dang / nags tshos bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / badzra p'a ni dang / nags tshos bsgyur ba'o//
translated: Translated by Vairocanarak攷믈ta and Nagtsho.
